Documentation for visualize-makefile¶

Contents

  • Documentation for visualize-makefile
    • Syntax
    • Author
    • License

Given a path to a Makefile, use makefile2graph to visualize the Makefile and open it in atril.

Syntax¶

$1 . . . makefile to visualize

Author¶

Charles Daniels
